About

August Agents was created to help you deliver projects more efficiently.

We have over 45 years’ experience in the electrical industry including contractor, distributor, manufacturer, and manufacturer representative backgrounds. Our expertise gives us the ability to understand your projects, anticipate your needs, and consult on solutions to help you deliver on time.

When August Agents was founded, we shared the same vision for bringing top brands together to create a one-stop shop for all your electrical needs.
